<title level="1" right="Spell 7" pfs="Standard">[Finger of Death](/Spells.aspx?ID=116)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Death" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=40" />
<trait label="Necromancy" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=117" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 338 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Traditions**
[Divine](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=2), [Primal](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=4)

**Bloodlines**
[Undead](/Bloodlines.aspx?ID=10), [Psychopomp](/Bloodlines.aspx?ID=13)

<row gap="medium">

<row gap="tiny">
<row>**Cast**</row>
<row><actions string="Two Actions" /></row>
<row>[somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283), [verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284)</row>
</row>

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** 30 feet

**Target** 1 living creature
</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Saving Throw** [basic](/Rules.aspx?ID=329) Fortitude

</row>

</column>

---

You point your finger toward the target and speak a word of slaying. You deal 70 negative damage to the target. If the damage from _finger of death_ reduces the target to 0 Hit Points, the target dies instantly.

---
**Heightened (+1)** The damage increases by 10.
name: Finger of Death
